page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: There are two{nursery}schools catering for 3-5 year old children each with 120 children and 5 staff. The school splits into two groups from 8:50-12:45 and 11:45-15:00. They have no school uniforms or specific punishments. There are 8{primary}schools whose pupils are 5-12 years old with staff numbers ranging from 9-17. Five schools have optional uniform dress. The three{secondary}schools cater for 12-18 year olds. They are large with staffs of 60+ teaching about 900 pupils. Corporal punishment is used occasionally in a few of these schools. Education is aimed at the{Certificate {of Secondary Education and General {Certificate of Education}examinations. School services are provided free and are financed from the rates.
